00026 namespace DisturbancePacketUtility {
00027 
00028 void writeToPacket( Packet& packet, int& packetPosition,
00029                     const DisturbanceElement& currentDist );
00030 
00031 template < typename Container, typename Selector >
00032 void writeToPacket( const Container& container,
00033                     Selector selectValue,
00034                     Packet* packet,
00035                     int& packetPosition,
00036                     bool removeDisturbances,
00037                     bool removeAll ) {
00038 
00039    packet->incWriteLong( packetPosition, container.size() );
00040 
00041    typename Container::const_iterator it = container.begin();
00042    for (; it != container.end(); ++it ) {
00043       writeToPacket( *packet, packetPosition, *selectValue( *it ) );
00044    }
00045 
00046    byte b = 0;
00047    if ( removeDisturbances ) {
00048       b |= 0x01;
00049    }
00050 
00051    if ( removeAll ) {
00052       b |= 0x02;
00053    }
00054 
00055    packet->incWriteByte( packetPosition, b );
00056    packet->setLength( packetPosition );
00057 
00058 }
00059 template <typename Container>
00060 inline void writeToPacket( const Container& container,
00061                            Packet* packet,
00062                            int& packetPosition,
00063                            bool removeDisturbances,
00064                            bool removeAll ) {
00065    writeToPacket( container,
00066                   STLUtility::makeIdentity( container ),
00067                   packet, packetPosition,
00068                   removeDisturbances, removeAll );
00069 }
00070 
00071 // specialization for map
00072 template <>
00073 inline void writeToPacket<IDToDisturbanceMap>
00074 ( const IDToDisturbanceMap& container,
00075   Packet* packet,
00076   int& packetPosition,
00077   bool removeDisturbances,
00078   bool removeAll ) {
00079    writeToPacket( container,
00080                   STLUtility::makeSelect2nd( container ),
00081                   packet, packetPosition,
00082                   removeDisturbances, removeAll );
00083 }

00085 
00091 int calcPacketSize( const DisturbanceElement& disturbance );
00092 
00101 template <typename Container, typename Selector>
00102 int calcPacketSize( int headerSize, const Container& disturbances,
00103                     Selector selectValue )
00104 {
00105    int size = headerSize;
00106    size += 4; // Size of distmap
00107 
00108    for ( typename Container::const_iterator it = disturbances.begin(),
00109             itEnd = disturbances.end(); it != itEnd; ++it ) {
00110       size += calcPacketSize( *selectValue( *it ) );
00111    }
00112    size++; // Remove or add byte
00113    return size;
00114 }
00115 
00117 template < typename Container >
00118 inline int calcPacketSize( int headerSize,
00119                            const Container& dists ) {
00120    return calcPacketSize( headerSize, dists,
00121                           STLUtility::makeIdentity( dists ) );
00122 }
00123 
00126 template <>
00127 inline int calcPacketSize<IDToDisturbanceMap>( int headerSize,
00128                                                const IDToDisturbanceMap&
00129                                                distMap ) {
00130    return calcPacketSize( headerSize, distMap,
00131                           STLUtility::makeSelect2nd( distMap ) );
00132 }
